评论详情: Loved it! Great material, a bit oversized so size down.

I usually wear somewhere between a Large and an XL, so I ordered a Medium - it's still WAY big on me! Since I don't want to look like someone who has been through a shrink ray, I've decided to use this as a lazy day, hanging around the house kind of shirt. It's very comfortable, just wish I would have ordered down yet another size.
like the simple design for this baggy shirt

评论概述: Quality oversized tee from a reliable brand
评论详情: Good quality streetwear-style oversized T-shirt from the ever-reliable Aelfric Eden.  Our family owns several pieces from this brand - they make good stuff and sell it for a reasonable price.  This shirt is no different.  Heavyweight fabric with a washed-and-faded look and a huge, high quality graphic with a spray-painted vibe.  Oversized fit - true to size in the shoulders, loose around the biceps, and blousey and long in the torso.  Meant to pair with baggy pants or jeans.Short story:  if this is your style, this is a good quality shirt for a good price.

This pattern is very trendy and cool. It can be worn by both men and women with an oversized fit. In my experience, Aelfric Eden products are always great quality and this one is no exception. It is a great everyday t-shirt: breathable and soft .

This is a very thick tee, I was really surprised at the quality and instantly fell in love with it. Basically became my most heavily rotated shirt for the past month and I've gotten tons of compliments so far. Really dig the design, really artsy, will definitely be getting more shirts from these guys because this one will last 10 years easy. I'm not normally someone who wears baggy shirts, but this one is baggy in a more fitted sort of way. Absolutely recommend picking one of these up.
Heavy duty, with good stitching. Has a sun faded look with a faded black star. Sizes run large. Comfortable.

I love the oversized fit of this shirt and how thick the material is. However the placement of the star print is a bit strange. I feel the star maybe should have been smaller or placed higher up. It's just a bit awkward looking when it's actually worn.

I absolutely love this T-shirt just to wear around the house. It’s 100% cotton and extremely soft with a very vintage feel. I ordered a size small and it fits perfectly extremely comfortable to wear and is long so it looks perfect with a cute pair of shorter biker shorts just to show the bottom. I love the gray color and the heavy, thick material follow the size chart. 5‘,3“ tall, 155 pounds, 32 DD
Very well made and my son loves it.

This shirt came in very oversized, but it was a blessing in disguise. It makes a very comfortable home shirt or even a shirt dress for when I want a streetwear style. If you want a more fitted look, I recommend sizing one down.
So soft and breathable very soft and comfortable love the design and color .
Has the potential to be so cute but it's ridiculously heavy weight. Also the oversized claim isn't accurate, a small is a normal small.
